thread.section_title: Blinds on the Net Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blinds on the Net | blindsonthenet.com.au
thread.title: Trudles
thread.title_full: Blinds on the Net reviewed by Trudles

author: Trudles
title: Trudles
text:
I have used blinds on the net since 2013 - slowly buying blinds over the years. The one time I got seduced by buying a cheaper version at s local store, I immediately noticed the difference! poorer quality chains, noisy, blind starting curling and it dragged when pulling up and down.
They are a great price, great quality and I am still matching the colour and style of blinds I bought in 2013! Although I do look longingly at the new styles.
